pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools to Study Bone Compactness // Bone Profiler is a scientific method and a software used to model bone section for paleontological and ecological studies. See Girondot and Laurin 2003 https://www.researchgate.net/publication/280021178_Bone_pr ofiler_A_tool_to_quantify_model_and_statistically_compare_bone- section_compactness_profiles.
